琭字的基本解释

琭
lù
〔琭琭〕（玉）有光泽的样子。

琭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《廣韻》盧谷切，入屋，來。］
玉名。

琭字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　琭； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页735第03
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?盧谷切，音祿。【廣韻】玉名。【韻會】玉貌。【老子·道德經】不欲琭琭如玉，珞珞如石。【註】琭琭喻少，珞珞喻多。一云承上文，貴以賤爲本言。蘇轍註：非若玉之琭琭，貴而不能賤，石之珞珞，賤而不能貴也。

琭字的源字形

琭字的起名意思

形容稀少珍贵。

jade

jade

jade

[①]［lù］
["Guangyun" Lu Guqi, enter the house, come. ]
Jade name.
jade
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Jade Character Department] 　琭; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 735 No. 03
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Lu Guqie, Yinlu. [Guang Yun] Yu name. 【Rhyme】Jade appearance. [Lao Tzu·Tao De Jing] Don’t want Lianyun to be like jade, Luoluo is like stone. [Note] Lunyan Yu is less, Luoluo Yu is more. Yiyun inherited the above, saying that expensive is based on cheap. Su Zhe's Note: It is not Ruoyuzhilian, which is expensive but not cheap, and stone Luoluo is cheap but not expensive.
jade
